content: pattern notes headband is made flat in one piece the ends are folded around one another and seamed to form the twist materials premier® yarns anti-pilling® everyday® dk 100% anti-pilling acrylic 3 5 oz/100g 273yds/250m 1107-56 mustard 1 ball hook us size g-6 4 mm size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle removable stitch markers skills/techniques used in this pattern chain slip_stitch and single_crochet stitches working through the back loop seaming
